alert.note: Alert for Northwest Montgomery (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued January 10 at 9:30PM EST until January 12 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Baltimore MD/Washington DC has issued a Flood Watch for the following rivers in Maryland... Virginia... Potomac River at Edwards Ferry affecting Western Loudoun, Northwest Montgomery and Eastern Loudoun zones. ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO EARLY FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding is possible. * WHERE...Potomac River at Edwards Ferry. * WHEN...From this evening to early Friday morning. * IMPACTS...At 14.7 feet, The Chisel Branch Hiker/Biker Campsite near the C&O Canal trail starts flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:01 PM EST Wednesday the stage was 13.7 feet, or 1.3 feet below flood stage. - Forecast...Flood stage may be reached based on the latest forecast information. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - Please visit www.weather.gov/safety/flood for flood safety and preparedness information && River Name Fld Observed Thu Thu Thu Crest Location Stg Stg Day/Time 1AM 7AM 1PM Stg Time Date Potomac River Edwards Ferr 15.0 13.7 Wed 9 pm 13.8 14.2 14.4 14.4 1pm Thu &&
info.instruction: If you are in the watch area, remain alert to possible flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/washington or www.weather.gov/baltimore. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 530 AM EST.
